projectGridLines.title: Project 1   Title: simulation model preparation for electronics and automotive,   Project 2   Title: AI/ML in simulations
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1

Title: simulation model preparation for electronics and automotive

Description: Learn how to create and conduct simulations for automotive or electronics industry

Skill sets: Fundamentals of solid mechanics

Traits expectation:  Visualization, aptitude, Fundamentals

Expected learning: Learn industry practices and work on real problems.

Specific courses required for project execution: CAD design, Strength of materials

Project 2

Title: AI/ML in simulations

Description: Explore AI/ML on simulations

Skill sets: Aptitude, Coding

Traits expectation: Teamwork and aptitude

Expected learning: Industry best practices

Specific courses required for project execution: Python, C, AI/ML
